characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: INFANTRY units within 1" of a defence line, and behind it from the point of view of the firing unit, receive the benefit of cover.  When charging a unit of the opposite side of a defence line, the charge is successful if the charging unit can move within 2" of that unit. When resolving fights between units on two opposite sides of a defence line, unit can be chosen to fight and make their attacks if the enemy is within 2" instead of the normal 1".
